Package model.updateStrategy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccelerateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    (exerting acceleration on other balls) implemented purely as an interaction strategy.
    AssimilateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    Assimilation implemented purely as an interaction strategy.
    BrownianStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A concrete strategy class that implements IUpdateStategy.
    Collide2Strategy<TDispMsg>
    elastic collision implemented purely as an interaction strategy.
    CollideStrategy<TDispMsg>
    An UpdateStrategy that enables balls to collide/bounce and interact.
    ColorStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A concrete strategy class that implements IUpdateStategy.
    CurvingStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A concrete strategy class that implements IUpdateStategy.
    DrunkenStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A concrete strategy class that implements IUpdateStategy.
    EnlargeStrategy<TDispMsg>
    (Enlarge the size of the target ball) implemented purely as an interaction strategy.
    FadeOutStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A concrete strategy class that implements IUpdateStategy.
    FrictionStrategy<TDispMsg>
    (exerting friction on other balls) implemented purely as an interaction strategy.
    InfectStrategy<TDispMsg>
    An IUpdateStrategy that enables "sick" ball to "infect" other balls.
    KillStrategy<TDispMsg>
    kill/removing behavior implemented purely as an interaction strategy.
    NinjaStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A concrete strategy class that implements IUpdateStategy.
    OverlapStrategy<TDispCmd>
    Detects if the ball overlaps/collides with any other balls.
    RealmStrategy<TDispMsg>
    Detects if any other balls enters the realm of the context ball.
    SpawnStrategy<TDispMsg>  
    StraightStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A concrete strategy class that implements IUpdateStategy.
    SwitcherStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A concrete strategy class that implements IUpdateStategy.
